title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Red Jacket Road 2016 Summer Construction  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Red Jacket Road 2016 Summer Construction  Red Jacket Road and Fourth Street are closed due to construction. To access the Visitor Center please take Sixth Street and follow Scott Street to Fifth Street. Parking is available in the lot north of the Calumet Visitor Center.               Red Jacket Road will be mostly closed due to construction for much of 2016. To access the Visitor Center, take 6th Street to turn left on Scott Street. Then use the parking lot on the NW side of the Visitor Center.
